abilityList.text: While this unit is holding Ammo, ATK increases. Ammo capacity: 1

name: Pathfinder Sagittarius Prefect
description: An elite warrior proficient at using guns in long-range combat. Their attacks are precise, and especially deadly when loaded with special ammunition.

abilityList.text: While this unit is holding Ammo, ATK increases. Ammo capacity: 1

name: Pathfinder Artifex
description: A caster employing unusual Originium Arts. Able to extract energy from special Arts Units to inflict tremendous devastation.

abilityList.text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks inflict Burn damage. Ammo capacity: 1

name: Pathfinder Artifex Prefect
description: A caster employing unusual Originium Arts. Able to extract energy from special Arts Units to inflict horrific devastation.

abilityList.text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks inflict Burn damage. Ammo capacity: 1

name: Pathfinder Veles
description: A warrior who specializes in dropping into battle from the skies. They take greater pleasure from seeing their foes flustered by the loss of their supplies than actually defeating them.

abilityList.text: Able to land directly onto the battlefield.
Prioritizes attacking 'Gelato Stops'. Deals additional Arts Damage to 'Gelato Stops'.

name: Pathfinder Veles Prefect
description: An elite warrior who specializes in dropping into battle from the skies. In addition to defeating their enemies, they will also destroy their supplies in the blink of an eye, blowing the battle wide open.

abilityList.text: Able to land directly onto the battlefield.
Prioritizes attacking 'Gelato Stops'. Deals additional Arts Damage to 'Gelato Stops'.

name: Pathfinder Ballistarius
description: A stalwart warrior who stands on the front lines, firing shells capable of inflicting widespread destruction. By virtue of their physique, they can withstand the recoil from their cannons, as well as hold their own in close combat even without their weapons. Extremely reliable.

abilityList.text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks become long-ranged and deal Splash Damage. Ammo capacity: 2
Deals additional Arts damage to 'Gelato Stops'

name: Pathfinder Ballistarius Prefect
description: A stalwart warrior who rushes forward on the front lines, firing shells capable of inflicting widespread destruction. By virtue of their physique, they can withstand the recoil from their cannons, and are proficient in close combat even without their weapons. Extremely reliable.

abilityList.text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks become long-ranged and deal Splash Damage. Ammo capacity: 2
Deals additional Arts damage to 'Gelato Stops'

name: Pathfinder Dessert Vendor
description: Seems to be an ordinary street vendor. However, their carts are likely loaded with more than just snacks. Anger them at your own peril.

abilityList.text: While this unit is holding Ammo, periodically summons a <Snack Cart>. Ammo capacity: 3
Deals significantly increased damage to enemies blocking this unit

name: Renowned Pathfinder Dessert Vendor
description: Seems to be an ordinary street vendor. However, their carts are likely loaded with more than just snacks. Those who anger them will soon learn the true meaning of fear.

abilityList.text: While this unit is holding Ammo, periodically summons a <Luscious Snack Cart>. Ammo capacity: 3
Deals significantly increased damage to enemies blocking this unit

name: Snack Cart
description: A small cart that automatically tracks its delivery target. Of course, you will be able to help yourself to its contents — if you survive the explosion.

abilityList.text: Detonates when blocked, inflicting Arts damage and Burn damage to all nearby targets
Explosion deals a large amount of Arts damage to nearby 'Gelato Stops'

name: Luscious Snack Cart
description: A small cart that automatically tracks its delivery target. Of course, you will be able to help yourself to its contents — if you survive the massive explosion.

abilityList.text: Detonates when blocked, inflicting Arts damage and Burn damage to all nearby targets
Explosion deals a large amount of Arts damage to nearby 'Gelato Stops'

name: Pathfinder Nuncio
description: A warrior who has taken the initiative to step up to the role of Nuncio within the Pathfinders. Strong and agile, these warriors employ the experience they've gained in their work and prefer to fight by sealing off their opponents' moves.

abilityList.text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks become long-ranged and prevent the target from attacking or healing for a period of time. Ammo Capacity: 1
Deals additional Arts damage to 'Gelato Stops'

name: Oren, Legatus
description: The Legatus who stands head and shoulders above the rest, acting on his own principles. Preferring hit-and-run tactics to direct confrontations, he tries to deceive his opponents by sealing off their moves.

abilityList.text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks become long-ranged and prevent the target from attacking or healing for a period of time. Ammo Capacity: 1
Deals additional Arts damage to 'Gelato Stops'

name: Touch of the Sanguinarch
description: A creation of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' Originium Arts, flexible and difficult to defeat. According to rumors, the Sanguinarch is able to snatch the blood of other creatures, imbuing new life into it and taking it under his control.

abilityList.text: Reborn Creation (takes greatly reduced Physical and Arts damage)
Units blocking it gain +1 Block (up to a maximum of +6)

name: Touch of Benevolence
description: One of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' more elaborate creations, flexible and difficult to defeat. According to rumors, the Sanguinarch is able to snatch the blood of other creatures, imbuing new life into it and taking it under his control. Those given new life should praise the Sanguinarch for his benevolence.

abilityList.text: Reborn Creation (takes greatly reduced Physical and Arts damage)
Units blocking it gain +1 Block (up to a maximum of +6)

name: Gift of the Sanguinarch
description: A creation of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' Originium Arts that bears greater vitality. One who was powerful in life will continue to be a great threat to their enemies even after being reshaped by the power of the Sanguinarch's blessing.

abilityList.text: Reborn Creation (takes greatly reduced Physical and Arts damage)
Units blocking it gain +1 Block (up to a maximum of +6)

name: Gift of Magnanimity
description: A creation of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' Originium Arts that bears exceptional vitality. One who was powerful in life will continue to be a great threat to their enemies even after being reshaped by the power of the Sanguinarch's blessing. Therefore, those who continue ought to thank the Sanguinarch for his magnanimity.

abilityList.text: Reborn Creation (takes greatly reduced Physical and Arts damage)
Units blocking it gain +1 Block (up to a maximum of +6)

name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Warrior
description: A warrior of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed with the living blood of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. After falling in battle for the first time, his blood will continue to advance in his place.

abilityList.text: Will be reborn as a <Touch of the Sanguinarch> after falling in battle for the first time

name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Warrior Captain
description: A captain of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed with the living blood of the Sanguinarch of Vampires, more dangerous than a normal Sarkaz Royal Court Soldier. After falling in battle for the first time, his blood will continue to advance in his place.

abilityList.text: Will be reborn as a <Touch of Benevolence> after falling in battle for the first time

name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Artificer
description: An artificer of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed with the living blood of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. They gained a portion of Victoria's engineering expertise and are responsible for operating the reloading system of Londinium's city defense artillery.

abilityList.text: Continuously charges up Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery; when interrupted, the Defense Artillery will lose a portion of its charge progress
Will be reborn as a <Touch of the Sanguinarch> after falling in battle for the first time

name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Artificer Captain
description: An artificer captain of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed with the living blood of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. They gained a great amount of Victoria's engineering expertise and are responsible for operating the reloading system of Londinium's city defense artillery.

abilityList.text: Continuously charges up Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery; when interrupted, the Defense Artillery will lose a portion of its charge progress
Will be reborn as a <Touch of Benevolence> after falling in battle for the first time

name: Sarkaz Heirbearer ASV
description: An armored supply vehicle blessed by the Sanguinarch of Vampires. While on the battlefield, enhances Gift of the Sanguinarch and Touch of the Sanguinarch.

abilityList.text: While in battle, Reborn Creations have increased ATK, and their attacks will additionally deal Necrosis damage

name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Retrofit ASV
description: An armored supply vehicle meticulously blessed by the Sanguinarch of Vampires. While on the battlefield, enhances Gift of the Sanguinarch and Touch of the Sanguinarch.

abilityList.text: While in battle, Reborn Creations have increased ATK, and their attacks will additionally deal Necrosis damage

name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Chain Caster
description: A caster of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed by the Sanguinarch of Vampires. Trained by the Royal Court, they pose a wide-ranging threat on the battlefield with their Arts.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal Necrosis damage and jump between 4 targets, with each jump dealing reduced damage
Will be reborn as a <Gift of the Sanguinarch> after falling in battle for the first time

name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Chain Caster Captain
description: A caster captain of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed by the Sanguinarch of Vampires, more experienced than a normal Caster. Trained by the Royal Court, they pose a wide-ranging threat on the battlefield with their Arts.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal Necrosis damage and jump between 4 targets, with each jump dealing reduced damage
Will be reborn as a <Gift of Magnanimity> after falling in battle for the first time

name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Hatedrinker
description: A soldier of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed by the Sanguinarch of Vampires. The hatred of their compatriots slain on the battlefield builds up within them, making them more than eager to tear apart the enemies of the Sarkaz.

abilityList.text: Gains increased ATK for each Reborn Creation on the battlefield
Will be reborn as a <Gift of the Sanguinarch> after falling in battle for the first time

name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Wrathgorger
description: An elite soldier of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed by the Sanguinarch of Vampires. The wrath of their compatriots slain on the battlefield builds up within them, making them more than eager to tear apart every last enemy of the Sarkaz.

abilityList.text: Gains increased ATK for each Reborn Creation on the battlefield
Will be reborn as a <Gift of Magnanimity> after falling in battle for the first time

name: Sarkaz Requisitioned Engineering Drone
description: An engineering drone requisitioned by the Sarkaz Royal Court. They are a part of Londinium's defense system, modified to be more stealthy, but at the cost of greater wear-and-tear.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Invisible, gradually loses HP over time
Attacks charge Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery

name: Sarkaz Requisitioned Cutting-Edge Drone
description: A more sophisticated engineering drone requisitioned by the Sarkaz Royal Court. They are a part of Londinium's defense system, modified to be more stealthy, but at the cost of greater wear-and-tear.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Invisible, gradually loses HP over time
Attacks charge Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery

name: Bloodthirsty Heir
description: A creation of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' Originium Arts. They always thirst for more blood, strengthening themselves by stealing the blood of others.

abilityList.text: Attacks restore HP proportional to damage dealt

name: Engorged Heir
description: A creation of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' Originium Arts. Though their bodies are already engorged with the blood of others, their thirst never ceases.

abilityList.text: Attacks restore HP proportional to damage dealt

name: Sarkaz Royal Court Soldier
description: A soldier of the Sarkaz Royal Court. Londinium's munitions factories work day and night to produce weapons for the Sarkaz war effort. They boast a distinctly Sarkaz fighting style, but with greater discipline.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal Necrosis damage

name: Sarkaz Royal Court Elite Soldier
description: An elite soldier of the Sarkaz Royal Court. Under Manfred's training, they are not only more formidable warriors, but also more professional.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal Necrosis damage

name: Nethersea Founder
description: A Sea Terror that has inexplicably grown a chitinous skull. There is no corresponding organ to be found beneath it.

abilityList.text: Spawns Nethersea Brand at its location when defeated
Gains increased RES

name: Nourished Founder
description: A Sea Terror that generally only metamorphoses within an abundance of the nethersea brand. They can on exceptionally rare occasions be born from the remains of their multiple kin.

abilityList.text: Spawns Nethersea Brand at its location when defeated
Gains increased RES

name: Regressed Founder
description: A special individual among the Founders. Heeding the call of We Many, its body is ready to be preyed upon.

abilityList.text: Spawns Nethersea Brand at its location when defeated
Leaves its remains on location when defeated
[Directed Evolution] Gains increased RES

name: Nethersea Predator
description: A Sea Terror that has learned to use its chitinous skull to deal physical attacks, storing scraps of food in its body comprised of countless tiny creatures.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked while on Nethersea Brand
Gains Physical and Arts dodge (disabled by certain negative statuses)

name: Nourished Predator
description: A Sea Terror that has learned to hunt efficiently. They themselves do not appear to require nutrients, instead reserving them for their lower-level kin. Before they die, they turn themselves into one last food source.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked while on Nethersea Brand
Gains Physical and Arts dodge (disabled by certain negative statuses)

name: Regressed Predator
description: A special individual among the Predators. Heeding the call of We Many, its body is ready to be preyed upon.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked while on Nethersea Brand
Leaves its remains on location when defeated
[Directed Evolution] Gains Physical and Arts dodge (disabled by certain negative statuses)

name: Nethersea Brandguider
description: A new type of Sea Terror formed from a colony that was about to decay and die. In order to effectively utilize the last bit of nutrients in their bodies, all they need to do is smear themselves across the ground.

abilityList.text: After falling below half HP, spreads Nethersea Brand to tiles it travels over
After falling below half HP, gains increased DEF and Block requirement

name: Nourished Brandguider
description: Even if not on the verge of death, they will still choose to expand the survival range of their kin using their own flesh and blood. Reminiscent of the Bishop's final journey back to Iberia.

abilityList.text: After falling below half HP, spreads Nethersea Brand to tiles it travels over
After falling below half HP, gains increased DEF and Block requirement

name: Regressed Brandguider
description: A special individual among the Brandguiders. Heeding the call of We Many, its body is ready to be preyed upon.

abilityList.text: After falling below half HP, spreads Nethersea Brand to tiles it travels over
Leaves its remains on location when defeated
[Directed Evolution] After falling below half HP, gains increased DEF and Block requirement

name: Nethersea Spewer
description: Possesses a hard, chitinous shell that it uses to protect itself, possibly capable of sporulation or a similar function. A commonly seen Sea Terror where the nethersea brand proliferates.

abilityList.text: Can attack all targets located on Nethersea Brand
Attacks 3 enemies simultaneously

name: Nourished Spewer
description: A Sea Terror that has largely lost control of its functions, spewing out its spore-like progeny at a rate that surpasses its physical capacity, causing it to wear itself out prematurely.

abilityList.text: Can attack all targets located on Nethersea Brand
Attacks 3 enemies simultaneously

name: Regressed Spewer
description: A special individual among the Spewers. Heeding the call of We Many, its body is ready to be preyed upon.

abilityList.text: Can attack all targets located on Nethersea Brand
Leaves its remains on location when defeated
[Directed Evolution] Attacks 3 targets simultaneously

name: Nethersea Swarmcaller
description: A rare Sea Terror, able to manipulate the tiny creatures in the air and on the ground to eat away at their surroundings even in the absence of the nethersea brand. They seem to call the brand itself to life, hence their name.

abilityList.text: Continually inflicts Arts damage and Nervous Impairment in an area around it
Has Status resistance and is immune to Slow

name: Nourished Swarmcaller
description: A special and extremely-rare individual, boasting incredible destructive power and far-reaching transmission range. They are unable to be dealt with through conventional means, Inquisitors must be extra vigilant around them.

abilityList.text: Continually inflicts Arts damage and Nervous Impairment in an area around it
Has Status resistance and is immune to Slow

name: Regressed Swarmcaller
description: A special individual among the Swarmcallers. Heeding the call of We Many, its body is ready to be preyed upon.

abilityList.text: Continually inflicts Arts damage and Nervous Impairment in an area around it
Leaves its remains on location when defeated
[Directed Evolution] Has Status resistance and is immune to Slow

name: Nethersea Reefbreaker
description: An extremely aggressive individual born from the nethersea brand, capable of inflicting tremendous damage to its surrounding environment for its kin to transform. Lifeforms not considered kin fall under this category.

abilityList.text: Gains Invisibility when on Nethersea Brand
Gains increased ATK for each time it deals damage, decaying quickly after it stops attacking
Deals increased damage to enemies blocking this unit

name: Nourished Reefbreaker
description: A Sea Terror born from the nethersea brand, used to expel entities that pose a significant threat to its kin, or to completely destroy environments unsuitable for sustaining life. All civilizations on land fall under this category.

abilityList.text: Gains Invisibility when on Nethersea Brand
Gains increased ATK for each time it deals damage, decaying quickly after it stops attacking
Deals increased damage to enemies blocking this unit

name: Regressed Reefbreaker
description: A special individual among the Reefbreakers. Heeding the call of We Many, its body is ready to be preyed upon.

abilityList.text: Gains Invisibility when on Nethersea Brand
Leaves its remains on location when defeated
[Directed Evolution] Gains increased ATK after successfully dealing damage, decaying quickly after it stops attacking

name: 'Street Layabout'
description: Armed militants disguised as Infected, they are well-acquainted with the local situation. They look no different from ordinary Infected and easily blend into the crowd.

abilityList.text: When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals a certain percentage of Arts damage

name: 'Street Drunk'
description: Armed militants disguised as Infected, they are overly acquainted with the local situation, to the point that they have become alcoholics hanging around the street pubs, their mission long forgotten.

abilityList.text: When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals a certain percentage of Arts damage

name: 'Street Performer'
description: Armed militants disguised as Infected, they know the local situation by heart. Their weapon of choice is the triangle simply because it is easy to carry around, and definitely not because the triangle has no grade certification and is easy to play.

abilityList.text: When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals an additional hit

name: 'Street Musician'
description: Armed militants disguised as Infected, they are overly acquainted with the local situation. Aware that they may be exposed by their unfamiliarity with other instruments, they choose to use the triangle.

abilityList.text: When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals an additional hit

name: Mass-Produced Colossus
description: An Originium Arts creation that sacrifices stability for miniaturization. Well-equipped for breaching, it is often used to break through enemy lines. Like its creator, it is vulnerable to interference from external energy.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 2 Block
When in Realigned Flux, DEF and RES are greatly reduced

name: Enhanced Mass-Produced Colossus
description: An Originium Arts creation that sacrifices stability for miniaturization. Very well-equipped for breaching, it is often used to break through enemy lines. Its physical strength has been improved but its weakness to interference remains an issue.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 2 Block
When in Realigned Flux, DEF and RES are greatly reduced

name: Spire Caster
description: One of the backbones of the Leithanian army. Able to cause large area damage under relatively stable conditions. Absent support equipment and personnel, they are vulnerable to interference from external energy.

abilityList.text: Attacks 2 enemies simultaneously
When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals Splash damage

name: Battleworn Spire Caster
description: A Spire Caster with experience in war. Specializes in causing extreme area damage under relatively stable conditions. While highly confident, they are still vulnerable to interference from external energy.

abilityList.text: Attacks 2 enemies simultaneously
When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals Splash damage

name: Remnant Violinist
description: Cunning remnants of the Witch King, they were once violinists of a certain orchestra in the capital. Years of lying low have honed their observational prowess, and they will make use of anything to defeat their enemies.

abilityList.text: Attacks can travel along Realigned Flux, dealing damage to all connected units

name: Remnant Principal Violinist
description: Scheming remnants of the Witch King, they were once the principal violinist of a certain orchestra in the capital. It's said that they stole their position from another by forcing the stage setup to be changed.

abilityList.text: Attacks can travel along Realigned Flux, dealing damage to all connected units

name: Remnant Saxophonist
description: Irritable remnants of the Witch King, they once attempted to bribe their way into a certain orchestra in the capital. After many years of lying low, they have lost much of their sanity and now try to tear their enemies apart using music itself.

abilityList.text: When blowing at full force, fires ranged attacks in all 4 directions, dealing high Physical damage to allies hit. These attacks can be blocked by Realigned Flux

name: Remnant Official Saxophonist
description: Hysterical remnants of the Witch King, they once spent large sums of money to join a certain orchestra in the capital, yet were too impatient to arrange a rehearsal of the saxophone concerto with their sponsor.

abilityList.text: When blowing at full force, fires ranged attacks in all 4 directions, dealing high Physical damage to allies hit. These attacks can be blocked by Realigned Flux

name: Remnant Field Caster
description: Stubborn remnants of the Witch King, they were once the composer of a certain orchestra in the capital. During their many years of lying low, they researched vile arts nearly lost to mankind, staining their hands red with blood, yet they have little to show for it.

abilityList.text: Prioritizes targets on Realigned Flux, Stunning them and continually dealing Arts damage while cutting off nearby Realigned Flux

name: Remnant Elite Field Caster
description: Unrepentant remnants of the Witch King, they were once the sponsor of a certain orchestra in the capital. There are whispers of connections to the Spire, but most of these turned out to be nothing more than far-fetched rumors.

abilityList.text: Prioritizes targets on Realigned Flux, Stunning them and continually dealing Arts damage while cutting off nearby Realigned Flux

name: Blackwater Originium Slug
description: A wild infected creature that normally lives in the nomadic city's sewers, it has surfaced after being provoked. It emits an unpleasant odor, but what's more vexing is that no one knows where they will pop up from next.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield

name: Blackwater Originium Slug α
description: A wild infected creature that is more dangerous than a normal Blackwater Originium Slug. It normally lives in the nomadic city's sewers, but has surfaced after being provoked. Both its striking odor and its elusiveness often catch people off-guard.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield

name: Dame Gertrude
description: Gertrude Strollo, Lehnsfrau of Vyseheim and a researcher of energy induction and redirection. Suffers from chronic insomnia and often goes without sleep.

abilityList.text: Attacks two targets simultaneously.
Cannot be blocked.
Can create a <Virtual Image> at the current location

name: Rhine Defense Member
description: Guard personnel of Rhine Lab. With their company-provided anti-riot gear and training, they are qualified for escort duties.

abilityList.text: Blocks 1 instance of Physical or Arts damage

name: Rhine Defense Senior Member
description: Security personnel of Rhine Lab. With their company-provided anti-riot gear and advanced training, they are much more qualified for escort duties.

abilityList.text: Blocks 1 instance of Physical or Arts damage

name: Rhine Engineering Member
description: An engineer of Rhine Lab. Responsible for both providing equipment and giving their professional opinion on its production, they also maintain a close relationship with the Energy Section.

abilityList.text: Recovers the HP of inactive <R-Series Power Armors>

name: Rhine Engineering Senior Member
description: A senior engineer of Rhine Lab. Energy managed to convince Columbia's officials to provide the company more funding, so Engineering took the chance to design and produce even more sophisticated equipment.

abilityList.text: Recovers the HP of inactive <R-Series Power Armors>

name: Dor-1 Failure
description: A product of Dorothy's failed experiments. An irregularly-shaped silver object emanating a soft glow, like a slumbering Dreamland.

abilityList.text: When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers some SP

name: Dor-α Failure
description: A product of Dorothy's failed experiments. An irregularly-shaped silver object emanating a soft glow, its unusual appearance instinctively scares people away from it.

abilityList.text: When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers some SP

name: Dor-2 Replica
description: A product of Dorothy's repeated experiments. She was fascinated by its beauty when it was first created.

abilityList.text: When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers some SP

name: Dor-β Replica
description: A product of Dorothy's repeated experiments. Even though it fell far below expectations, she remains ever hopeful.

abilityList.text: When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers some SP

name: Dor-3 Bionic
description: A product of Dorothy's private experiments. To her, it is not a mere creation, it is her family, her dream.

abilityList.text: When not blocked, Physical and Arts damage taken is significantly reduced
When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers a lot of SP

name: Dor-γ Bionic
description: A product of Dorothy's private experiments. Dreams must ultimately feed back into reality, and she hopes to be a warm and safe harbor.

abilityList.text: When not blocked, Physical and Arts damage taken is significantly reduced
When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers a lot of SP

name: Experimental Power Armor
description: An unpiloted Power Armor. It is able to function without a pilot, but nevertheless maintains high agility.

name: Test Power Armor
description: An unpiloted Power Armor. It seems to have a mind of its own, and even experienced engineers struggle to tell if it's being piloted.

name: R-31 Heavy Power Armor
description: A model that appeared around half a year ago among some mercenary groups, its performance is on par with mass-produced military models from five years ago. Rhine Lab's Energy Section cooperates with many parties, and continues to look for ever more opportunities.

abilityList.text: [Overload] Continuously deals Physical damage to the target proportional to the unit's ATK, andStuns the target

name: R-31a Heavy Power Armor
description: A model that appeared around half a year ago among some mercenary groups, its performance is on par with mass-produced military models from five years ago. Technology is unregulated, so Columbians continue to seek greater efficiency within the bounds of the law.

abilityList.text: [Overload] Continuously deals Physical damage to the target proportional to the unit's ATK, andStuns the target

name: R-11 Assault Power Armor
description: A model equipped with long-ranged weapons, massively increasing its offensive capabilities. While these experimental weapons are still in the prototype phase, its energy and firepower cannot be overlooked.

abilityList.text: Attacks 4 enemies simultaneously

name: R-11a Assault Power Armor
description: A model equipped with long-ranged weapons, massively increasing its offensive capabilities. It's difficult to imagine what sort of changes might come about if this tech could be mass-produced.

abilityList.text: Attacks 4 enemies simultaneously

name: Dorothy
description: Dorothy Franks, director of Rhine Lab's Originium Art Section. With the power of both technology and ideals, she hopes to eliminate the differences between people. The weak will always receive her protection.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked.
Can deploy traps. Allies who step on them will receive Arts damage and be Stunned for some time

name: Alcohol Lover
description: A somewhat tipsy Durin. Just inebriated enough to think they're battling against some evil creature.

abilityList.text: Initially has 100% Physical Dodge for a period of time

name: Alcohol Association Member
description: A piss-drunk Durin. 'I'm not drunk! Who said I was drunk? Was it you?!'

abilityList.text: Initially has 100% Physical Dodge for a period of time

name: Lakeside Volunteer
description: An amateur lifeguard doing nothing in particular. Because there really was nobody in need of saving, he instead decided to take up boxing, and unexpectedly had quite the talent for it.

abilityList.text: Upon dropping below half HP for the first time, gains 100% Physical Dodge for a period of time

name: Lakeside Lifeguard
description: A professional lifeguard who goes around shooting the breeze. Strong in stature and bronzed in complexion, one look at him is enough to give a sense of security. But in actuality, he can't swim at all, and got that tan from high-intensity outdoor boxing training.

abilityList.text: Upon dropping below half HP for the first time, gains 100% Physical Dodge for a period of time

name: Sandcastle Builder
description: A Durin who has made a hobby out of building sandcastles. He despises those who would kick up the waters of the artificial lake, and so he installed an Arts Unit onto his construction tool.

name: Sandcastle Architect
description: A Durin who has made a career out of designing sandcastles. Having accepted the reality that it is impossible to actually build a sandcastle, he has not even been drafting designs recently, instead focusing his efforts on tinkering with the Arts Unit.

name: Volleyball Serving Cart
description: A volleyball-serving cart designed for use by friendless tourists. However, they see no use at all, as there are far too many people coming to play volleyball.

abilityList.text: Gains increased ATK with each attack (up to a limit); when affected by certain Negative Statuses, these stacks will be lost

name: Volleyball Spiking Cart
description: A volleyball-spiking cart designed as a revenge against someone. Continuously makes powerful spikes at nearby people in an attempt to ruin all volleyball matches on the beach.

abilityList.text: Gains increased ATK with each attack (up to a limit); when affected by certain Negative Statuses, these stacks will be lost

name: Full Metal Surfing Instructor
description: A sturdy mechanical surfing instructor that can withstand strong winds and waves. Its weaknesses are twofold: despite its anti-rust coating, it still rusts easily, and also it doesn't float.

abilityList.text: Can stop <Self-Driving Carts>
When not blocked, Physical and Arts damage taken is significantly reduced

name: Alloy Surfing Instructor
description: A sturdy mechanical surfing instructor that can withstand water and corrosion. High-density rare alloys were incorporated to increase its resistance to rust, but as such, it sinks even harder.

abilityList.text: Can stop <Self-Driving Carts>
When not blocked, Physical and Arts damage taken is significantly reduced

name: Fully-Enclosed Beach Buggy
description: A beach buggy beloved by all. Carries three passengers in addition to the driver. Cool and breezy on the inside, it's perfect for those tuckered out from playing.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by Operators with 3 or more Block
When next to enemies that are both non-Machine and non-Leader, they will be loaded inside as passengers (up to 3 max), and will be unloaded when this unit is defeated

name: Competitive-Grade Beach Buggy
description: A beach buggy beloved by all. Though its capacity is the same, all its other peripherals have been upgraded - in particular, the AC unit that effortlessly makes driver and passengers alike shiver.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by Operators with 3 or more Block
When next to enemies that are both non-Machine and non-Leader, they will be loaded inside as passengers (up to 3 max), and will be unloaded when this unit is defeated

name: Mead-Grade Waker-Upper
description: A powerful machine that sends chills across the beach with its might, providing a complimentary water cannon service for drunkards by the lake. The only downside being that it has no way of actually identifying who is drunk.

abilityList.text: Upon taking damage for the first time, gains significantly increased ASPD and Movement Speed for a period of time

name: Whiskey-Grade Waker-Upper
description: A terrifying machine that sweeps across the beach, equipped with an ultra-powerful water cannon strong enough to blast any drunkard to their senses. After someone secretly tampered with its targeting logic, it now only blasts sober people.

abilityList.text: Upon taking damage for the first time, gains significantly increased ASPD and Movement Speed for a period of time

name: Rot Eater
description: Part of the Nachzehrer army. The longer they remain on the battlefield, the harder they are to defeat, absorbing the enemy's strength as they grow increasingly deadly.

abilityList.text: The more enemies defeated, the higher its HP, ATK, and DEF when spawned from the Twigs That Crave
Releases Corruption, causing your nearby units to continuously lose HP

name: Sarkaz Witherer
description: Part of the Nachzehrer army. Death cannot stop their corrupting presence, as their corpses continue to corrupt the land.

abilityList.text: Releases Corruption when defeated, causing your nearby units to continuously lose HP

name: Sarkaz Witherer Captain
description: Elite member of the Nachzehrer army. Death simply causes them to spread their corruption even faster, leaving behind a wasteland where few could survive.

abilityList.text: Releases Corruption when defeated, causing your nearby units to continuously lose HP

name: Sarkaz Wither Caster
description: Part of the Nachzehrer army. They are able to heal their kin as they attack the enemy. Life is a constant cycle of devouring and sharing.

abilityList.text: Continuously heals the Twigs That Crave

name: Sarkaz Wither Caster Captain
description: Elite member of the Nachzehrer army. Experts at healing their kin as they attack the enemy. Life is a constant cycle of devouring and sharing.

abilityList.text: Continuously heals the Twigs That Crave

name: Seed of Withering
description: Originium Arts creation of the Nachzehrer King. Mindless except for an obsession with self-destruction. They create death for others to feed upon.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Self-destructs when near an Operator, dealing Physical damage

name: Seed of Decay
description: Originium Arts creation of the Nachzehrer King. It is a violation of the laws of nature, rejecting life for death. They create death for others to feed upon.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Self-destructs when near an Operator, dealing Physical damage

name: Rotchaser
description: Originium Arts creation of the Nachzehrer King. Fast-moving, they do not understand the concept of healing. They exist only to create death, and the power of healing robs them of their powers.

abilityList.text: Attacks cause the target to take Arts damage over time; effect removed when the target is healed

name: Rampaging Rotchaser
description: Originium Arts creation of the Nachzehrer King. They do not understand the concept of healing, even if they are stopped. They exist only to create death. Thoughts are incompatible with death, and they never stop.

abilityList.text: Attacks cause the target to take Arts damage over time; effect removed when the target is healed

name: Sarkaz Wither Devourer
description: Part of the Nachzehrer army. Devours any obstacle in its way, including the living. Anything and everything is food to it.

abilityList.text: When blocked for the first time, devours the blocker. DEF is greatly increased, but Movement Speed is reduced
Returns devoured Operator when defeated

name: Sarkaz Wither Maw
description: Elite member of the Nachzehrer army. Devours any obstacle in its way, including the living. Anything and everything is food to it. Only death can make it surrender what it devoured.

abilityList.text: When blocked for the first time, devours the blocker. DEF is greatly increased, but Movement Speed is reduced
Returns devoured Operator when defeated

name: Sarkaz Wither Tank
description: Equipment of the Nachzehrer army, clearing up obstacles for the army's march. It is a powerful siege weapon, but its main role is to spread corruption.

abilityList.text: Only attacks ground units
Melee attacks deal more damage
After several attacks, the next attack will release Corruption

name: Advanced Sarkaz Wither Tank
description: Advanced equipment of the Nachzehrer army, clearing up obstacles for the army's march. Its attack power increases at close range. It is a powerful siege weapon, but its main role is to spread corruption.

abilityList.text: Only attacks ground units
Melee attacks deal more damage
After several attacks, the next attack will release Corruption

name: Londinium Mobile Defense Artillery
description: Part of Londinium's city defenses. Has a large attack area. Built by the city's workers in their factories.

abilityList.text: Capable of long-range attacks
Locks on to the target with the highest max HP and bombards it several times, dealing Arts damage to the unit in range with the highest HP percentage

name: Londinium Precision Mobile Defense Artillery
description: Part of Londinium's city defenses. Has a very large attack area and greatly improved accuracy. Built by the city's workers in their factories.

abilityList.text: Capable of long-range attacks
Locks on to the target with the highest max HP and bombards it several times, dealing Arts damage to the unit in range with the highest HP percentage

name: Steam Tank
description: Armored vehicle employing Victorian steam technology, even more dangerous when it has taken damage.

abilityList.text: When HP drops to 50%, ASPD and Movement Speed are greatly increased, and becomes immune to most control effects.

name: Scorching Steam Tank
description: Advanced armored vehicle employing Victorian steam technology, even more dangerous when it has taken damage. Virtually unstoppable when it is on a rampage.

abilityList.text: When HP drops to 50%, ASPD and Movement Speed are greatly increased, and becomes immune to most control effects.

name: Sarkaz Royal Court Caster
description: A caster of the Sarkaz Royal Court. Sarkaz witchcraft is often more dangerous in battle than war machines. They boast a distinctly Sarkaz fighting style, but with greater discipline.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal additional Necrosis damage
Locks on to your units, dealing continuous Arts damage, and causing area Necrosis damage when casting is complete

name: Sarkaz Royal Court Elite Caster
description: An elite caster of the Sarkaz Royal Court. Sarkaz witchcraft is often more dangerous in battle than war machines. Their skill and discipline are second to none.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal additional Necrosis damage
Locks on to your units, dealing continuous Arts damage, and causing area Necrosis damage when casting is complete

name: Theresis
description: Regent Theresis of Kazdel has gathered the Sarkaz army at Londinium and occupied The Shard. If total war is to be avoided, he must be stopped from declaring war on the dukes.

abilityList.text: Cannot be attacked, will not deplete Life Points on leaving the field
Knocks down anything in its way

name: Famiglia Soldier
description: Low-level mafiosi who obey the orders of their superiors unquestioningly. Their lives are hardly worth anything, but their deaths are sufficient cause for their famiglia to seek revenge.

abilityList.text: Increases Blood Debt by a miniscule amount when defeated

name: Elite Famiglia Soldier
description: Battle-hardened, low-level mafiosi who are strong and swift-footed, worthy of being called elite fighters. When they are buried, the famiglia might send a letter of condolence home, nothing more.

abilityList.text: Increases Blood Debt by a miniscule amount when defeated

name: Famiglia Crossbowman
description: Famiglia-trained crossbowmen, capable of striking from a distance. Crossbows for famiglia use are extremely sophisticated; when given emergency orders, these snipers will use basic Arts to complete their missions, not knowing where that knowledge came from.

abilityList.text: While under the Asset Liquidation status, attacks are converted into Arts damage

name: Elite Famiglia Crossbowman
description: Famiglia-trained crossbowmen with a wealth of experience. Their shots are more accurate, and more deadly as well. Famiglie always respect the ironclad order, so these crossbows are never upgraded into better models, and Arts remain just as essential as ever.

abilityList.text: While under the Asset Liquidation status, attacks are converted into Arts damage

name: Famiglia Intimidator
description: Famiglia-trained strongmen, their imposing statures a bluff of sorts. In actuality, famiglie value their mastery of Siracusan language over raw violence.

abilityList.text: More likely to be attacked by allied units
Increases Blood Debt when defeated

name: Famiglia Terrorizer
description: An exceptionally herculean famiglia strongman, known for his fiery temper. He does not begrudge the visits he pays to the relatives of others, but during key moments, his word is more resolute than stone.

abilityList.text: More likely to be attacked by allied units
Increases Blood Debt when defeated

name: Famiglia Caster
description: For Famiglia-trained Casters, their Originium Arts are the basis of their standing within the famiglia. Though these Casters have fairly mediocre Arts, they at least are effective at inciting hatred.

abilityList.text: Attacks two targets simultaneously.
Can stop attacking to continually increase Blood Debt

name: Elite Famiglia Caster
description: A skilled Caster can often turn the tide of a battle. Though these claim to hold formidable positions, everyone knows they are nothing without the protection of their famiglia.

abilityList.text: Attacks two targets simultaneously.
Can stop attacking to continually increase Blood Debt

name: Famiglia Limo
description: The famiglie's most common mode of transportation, sporting an interior as unassuming as the exterior, with only the bumper reinforced. In addition to transportation, they will also use this vehicle to bid 'buon viaggio' to their famiglia's enemies.

abilityList.text: Unloads 3 <Famiglia Soldiers> if this is unit is defeated while blocked

name: Famiglia Luxury Limo
description: A lesser-seen vehicle among the famiglie, sporting an unassuming exterior but a luxurious interior. Generally, these are only used to welcome the most distinguished of the famiglia's guests, and to convey to them the graces of the famiglia's high-ranking members.

abilityList.text: Unloads 3 <Elite Famiglia Soldiers> if this is unit is defeated while blocked

name: Famiglia Capo
description: A famiglia capo, highly respected and holding great power. Rumor has it that he never sets down his weapon, and though nobody knows where it might be hidden, some speculate that it may be inside his cigar.

abilityList.text: Increases Blood Debt whenever an enemy unit is defeated within range

name: Famiglia Heavy Capo
description: A ruthless famiglia capo who has commanded the awe of a great many mafiosi. He was there when the famiglie first rose to greatness, and withstood the tumultuous years of change up until the present. It seems that nothing can topple him now.

abilityList.text: Increases Blood Debt whenever an enemy unit is defeated within range

name: Famiglia Cleaner
description: A powerful assassin loyal to his famiglia, striking from the shadows before vanishing again, leaving only death in his wake. His title is known by all, but none dare speak of him.

abilityList.text: Gains additional buffs while under Asset Liquidation
Invisible

name: Famiglia Silent Cleaner
description: A peerless assassin loyal to his famiglia. The shadows serve his will, and he knows murder better than the back of his hand. He can be found in the background of every secret that has allowed his famiglia to rise and flourish, and those who have seen his true face are already buried six feet under.

abilityList.text: Gains additional buffs while under Asset Liquidation
Invisible

name: Father Agenir
description: Agenir, Sankta priest, one of the founders of Siracusa's ironclad order. Do not hesitate—though he does not necessarily stand opposed to you, his guns speak first. By the way, his favorite eye mask was made in Lungmen.

abilityList.text: Gradually increases Blood Debt
Attacks have global range when Asset Liquidation is active
Attacks using Ammo decrease the target's DEF. Ammo capacity: 10

name: 'None of My Business'
description: A drunken man wobbling around with his hat pulled low. The incendiary bombs lying around the battlefield have nothing to do with him. At least, that's what he's always insisted in his affidavits.

abilityList.text: After losing a certain percentage of HP, releases a permanent incendiary field
Friendly Operators inside the field take True damage every second

name: Siracusan Civilian
description: These Siracusan civilians seem to have strayed into the fighting despite having been evacuated along with the rest of the crowd earlier. For whatever reason, whenever an accident of any sort happens, everyone's wrath falls upon you.

abilityList.text: Gradually reduces Blood Debt over time while on the battlefield; however, increases Blood Debt by a significant amount upon dying

name: Special Forces Soldier
description: A mercenary under the long-term employ of a Victorian aristocrat. Often uses the terrain to conceal their movements.

abilityList.text: Gains Invisibility while in Reeds

name: Special Forces Captain
description: An experienced mercenary captain under the long-term employ of a Victorian aristocrat. Often uses the terrain to hide their movements.

abilityList.text: Gains Invisibility while in Reeds

name: Swamp Gloompincer
description: An Infected Creature commonly found in the swamps of Southern Victoria, known for randomly attacking travelers in the wilderness and posing a threat to the locals.

abilityList.text: Immune to the effects of Mire; gains increased Movement Speed while in Mire

name: Enraged Swamp Gloompincer
description: An Infected Creature commonly found in the swamps of Southern Victoria, more active than the regular gloompincers, known for attacking travelers in the wilderness and posing a huge threat to the locals.

abilityList.text: Immune to the effects of Mire; gains increased Movement Speed while in Mire

name: Dublinn Flamechaser Soldier
description: A Dublinn soldier fused with their Leader's ember. Long since dead, but Arts manipulation keeps their bodies moving towards their final desire, rising again and again.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal additional Burn damage while near burning Reeds
When defeated, turns into an Invisible <Ember of Resentment> that must be damaged 5 times to defeat; respawns after a period of time

name: Dublinn Flamechaser Elite Soldier
description: A elite Dublinn soldier fused with their Leader's ember. Chasing their Leader's ember even more fervently, their bodies are manipulated by Arts to ceaselessly rise from the dead.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal additional Burn damage while near burning Reeds
When defeated, turns into an Invisible <Ember of Fury> that must be damaged 5 times to defeat; respawns after a period of time

name: Dublinn Cannoneer
description: A ranged combatant in the Dublinn forces. They use a modified standard-issue Victorian military crossbow fitted with a launcher for explosive ammunition.

abilityList.text: After two attacks, the next attack deals Splash damage

name: Dublinn Cannoneer Captain
description: Captain of a ranged squad in the Dublinn forces. They use a modified standard-issue Victorian military crossbow fitted with a launcher for even more powerful explosive ammunition.

abilityList.text: After two attacks, the next attack deals Splash damage

name: Dublinn Flamecaller
description: A caster in the Dublinn forces skilled at manipulating flame, ignites everything around them, even their own deaths.

abilityList.text: Attacks ignite Reeds beneath the target
When defeated, deals Arts damage to all nearby friendly units and ignites all Reeds

name: Dublinn Flamecaller Captain
description: An elite caster in the Dublinn forces extremely adept at manipulating flame, ignites everything around them, even their own deaths.

abilityList.text: Attacks ignite Reeds beneath the target
When defeated, deals Arts damage to all nearby friendly units and ignites all Reeds

name: Swamp Rover
description: A military vehicle capable of traveling smoothly through swampy terrain, fitted with advanced detection equipment.

abilityList.text: Immune to the effects of Mire
Reveals Camouflaged and Invisible allied units within range

name: Heavy Swamp Rover
description: A military vehicle capable of traveling smoothly through swampy terrain, fitted with advanced detection equipment and reinforced armor.

abilityList.text: Immune to the effects of Mire
Reveals Camouflaged and Invisible allied units within range

name: Dublinn Flamechaser Guard
description: A Dublinn defender fused with their Leader's ember. Long since dead, but the Arts embedded in their equipment keep them standing to fight for their ambitions.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal additional Burn damage and takes reduced Physical and Arts damage while near burning Reeds
When defeated, turns into an Invisible <Ember of Avarice> that must be damaged 10 times to defeat; respawns after a period of time

name: Dublinn Flamechaser Elite Guard
description: An elite Dublinn defender fused with their Leader's ember. Chasing their Leader's ember even more fervently, the Arts embedded in their equipment make them hard to defeat.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal additional Burn damage and takes reduced Physical and Arts damage while near burning Reeds
When defeated, turns into an Invisible <Ember of Avarice> that must be damaged 10 times to defeat; respawns after a period of time

name: Dublinn Spec Ops
description: A soldier under the command of 'The Brigadier.' Specializing in ambushes and assaults, they are well-disciplined and completely devoted to the cause.

abilityList.text: Ignites Reeds upon passing by them
After several attacks, unleashes 5 consecutive slashes at the target

name: Dublinn Elite Spec Ops
description: An elite soldier under the command of 'The Brigadier.' The core of their ambush and assault tactics, they are well-disciplined and completely devoted to the cause.

abilityList.text: Ignites Reeds upon passing by them
After several attacks, unleashes 5 consecutive slashes at the target

name: 'The Brigadier'
description: 'The Brigadier,' a senior Dublinn officer and captain of the Redsteel Guard. With a blade tempered by the flames of war, he cuts through the chaos to find the order he has set his mind on.

abilityList.text: Ignites Reeds upon passing by them
After several attacks, unleashes 5 powerful consecutive slashes at the target

name: Di Beast
description: One of Ya's off-handed creations. With a body the color of the golden sands and extremely keen hearing, it stalks the streets like a shadow, collecting and relaying information.

name: Raging Di Beast
description: One of Ya's off-handed creations, its bloodlust honed by the golden sands. It is extremely keen of hearing and stalks the streets like a shadow, both fighting and collecting and relaying information.

name: Shanhaizhong Skirmisher
description: An ordinary Shanhaizhong member with a complex past. Their ridiculous slogan of 'the mounts, seas, and all in between shall be our master's' has spurred a large group of bandits to make trouble all over Yan.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Gains increased Attack Range when on Yumen Catastrophe Defenses

name: Shanhaizhong Vigilante
description: An ordinary Shanhaizhong member with a complex past. Their ridiculous slogan of 'the mounts, seas, and all in between shall be our master's' has spurred a large group of bandits to make trouble all over Yan, and many of them are involved in lawsuits.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Gains increased Attack Range when on Yumen Catastrophe Defenses

name: Shanhaizhong Relayer
description: A Shanhaizhong member responsible for relaying tactical orders. With their use of ciphers, they're more like trained professionals than a disorganized band of rogues.

abilityList.text: Deploys a Shanhaizhong Cipher Machine on the first deployable Yumen Catastrophe Defenses

name: Shanhaizhong Harbinger
description: A Shanhaizhong member responsible for analyzing intel and relaying tactical orders. With their use of ciphers, they're more like trained professionals than a disorganized band of rogues.

abilityList.text: Deploys a Shanhaizhong Cipher Machine on the first deployable Yumen Catastrophe Defenses

name: Shanhaizhong Desperado
description: A Shanhaizhong member tasked with defense. The Shanhaizhong have recruited many desperadoes, using their burly physiques and heavy shields to provide shelter for their comrades.

name: Shanhaizhong Phalanx
description: A Shanhaizhong member tasked with defense. The Shanhaizhong have recruited many desperadoes, many of them were the disasters of their places. With their burly physiques and special heavy shields, they are a threatening line of defense.

name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader
description: A Shanhaizhong leader hidden in their ranks. Elusive and unflinchingly cruel, are these acts of 'faith' delusional or simply selfish?

abilityList.text: Invisible
The next attack made after breaking Invisibility will deal increased damage

name: Shanhaizhong Secret-Keeper
description: A Shanhaizhong leader with a mysterious mission. Elusive, merciless, and unconcerned with their men's sacrifices. What are they really planning behind that fog of faith?

abilityList.text: Invisible
The next attack made after breaking Invisibility will deal increased damage

name: Shanhaizhong Seer
description: Shanhaizhong members who can cast strange Arts. They superstitiously believe in those huge beings, shouting 'the mounts, seas, and all in between shall be our master's' while displaying a fraction of that 'divine power.'

abilityList.text: Continuously locks on to a target and inflicts a large burst of Arts damage after the channel completes, gaining increased ASPD afterwards

name: Shanhaizhong Oracle
description: Shanhaizhong members who can cast strange Arts. They superstitiously believe in those huge beings and resent their own compatriots, shouting 'the mounts, seas, and all in between shall be our master's' while displaying a 'divine power' of unknown origin.

abilityList.text: Continuously locks on to a target and inflicts a large burst of Arts damage after the channel completes, gaining increased ASPD afterwards

name: 'Wallbreaker'
description: A siege cannon engineered by the Ministry of Engineering, hijacked by the Shanhaizhong when they infiltrated Yumen. Yumen rampages over the sea of sand, advancing unhindered, shattering stone and resolve alike.

abilityList.text: Prioritizes attacking friendly units located on Yumen Catastrophe Defenses

name: 'Fortbreaker'
description: A stronger siege cannon engineered by the Ministry of Engineering, hijacked by the Shanhaizhong when they infiltrated Yumen. Yumen rampages over the sea of sand, advancing unhindered, threatening to tear down all walls.

abilityList.text: Prioritizes attacking friendly units located on Yumen Catastrophe Defenses

name: 'Sandwalker'
description: A transport vehicle engineered by the Ministry of Engineering, hijacked by the Shanhaizhong when they infiltrated Yumen. Can carry up to four soldiers smoothly over desert terrain.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 4 Block
When next to enemies that are both non-Machine and non-Leader, they will be loaded inside as passengers (up to 4 max), and will be unloaded when this unit reaches a Ladder

name: 'Sand Voyager'
description: A 2nd generation transport vehicle engineered by the Ministry of Engineering, hijacked by the Shanhaizhong when they infiltrated Yumen. Can carry up to four soldiers over desert terrain or coordinate in urban defense.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 4 Block
When next to enemies that are both non-Machine and non-Leader, they will be loaded inside as passengers (up to 4 max), and will be unloaded when this unit reaches a Ladder

name: Hornbeast
description: An herbivore that moves in herds, common to the mountains. Docile creatures, they hide from predators using the mock-vegetation wool on their backs, but that's no reason to underestimate their pointed horns.

abilityList.text: Starts battle Resting. After being attacked, it and all surrounding hornbeasts become Combat-Ready

name: Hardy Hornbeast
description: A variety of hornbeast which startles into a frenzy at the drop of a hat. They attack viciously, throwing their sharp horns against anything nearby without the slightest warning. Given how often they concuss themselves, scholars are extremely confused as to how they haven't gone extinct yet.

abilityList.text: Starts battle Resting. After being attacked, it and all surrounding hornbeasts become Combat-Ready

name: Oxmane
description: A carnivore common to the mountains that hunts primarily in packs. Bearing developed mandibles, they crush their prey's skulls with ease. Most fond of feeding on hornbeast stragglers.

abilityList.text: Prioritizes attacking <Hornbeasts> and <Hardy Hornbeasts>

name: Keenfanged Oxmane
description: An Oxmane subspecies particular to certain regions. Perennial contention with large prey has led their teeth to grow sharp, sinking fast and firm into the fleshy parts of their quarry. Undeterred by their companions dying to their prey's retaliation, they will launch attacks again and again.

abilityList.text: Prioritizes attacking <Hornbeasts> and <Hardy Hornbeasts>

name: Blazing Originium Slug
description: A wild infected creature, they spray superheated fluids at their foes, posing more of a threat than typical Originium Slugs. Abundant in environments with abnormal energy, their breeding and migration patterns remain a mystery.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal Burn damage

name: Pyric Originium Slug
description: A wild infected creature, the final stages of infection having led them to burn even hotter. Their fluids, hot as magma, melt even their own bodies. Once cooled, beautiful patterns can be found in the pools they leave behind.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal Burn damage

name: Chitotex Clawbeast
description: An herbivore that dwells by cliffsides, their front claws equipped for digging out rock faces. They grow rear shells hard enough to withstand falling stones, but bear unusually soft bellies. Their delicious meat is the primary cause of their falling population.

abilityList.text: Weak spot located on its front, damage dealt to the rear is significantly decreased

name: Keratex Clawbeast
description: A Chitotex Clawbeast subspecies particular to certain regions. Their sturdy upper limbs accelerate their excavation of rock exponentially, while their stern shells can shrug off severe batterings. These traits allow them to better expand their territory.

abilityList.text: Weak spot located on its front, damage dealt to the rear is significantly decreased

name: Basorobeast
description: An herbivore that dwells by cliffsides. The protective boulders that crown their heads are, in fact, the secretions of a symbiotic organism. Some have witnessed Basorobeasts battling Chitotex Clawbeasts in turf wars.

abilityList.text: Weak spot located on its rear, damage dealt to the front is significantly decreased

name: Gravorobeast
description: A Basorobeast subspecies particular to certain regions. Regimens of knocking into cliff rock since infancy have honed their heads to exceptional sturdiness, able to shrug off fierce frontal attacks. Survival never ends, and the struggle never ceases.

abilityList.text: Weak spot located on its rear, damage dealt to the front is significantly decreased

name: Serrant Fowlbeast
description: A large and violent fowlbeast, it shoots sharp pennaceous feathers from the air to drive prey out of hiding, then uses strong claws to finish targets off once they're on their last legs. Liable to use prey clutched in its claws as an additional weapon against intruders in its territory.

abilityList.text: Occasionally flings dead <Oxmanes>, dealing heavy Physical damage

name: Daimoserrant Fowlbeast
description: A Serrant Fowlbeast subspecies particular to certain regions. Stronger pectoral muscles increase its flight capabilities, rendering it capable of launching torrential offensives from high elevation. It makes a renewed territorial bid, this time on the entire sky.

abilityList.text: Occasionally flings dead <Oxmanes>, dealing heavy Physical damage

name: Direswine
description: A robustly built omnivore, with an impenetrable epidermis leaving them with few natural predators. Violent headbutts are both their method of attack and a habit necessary for suppressing the growth of their fangs.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 2 Block
Gradually accelerates when charging, dealing damage based on Movement Speed to any target it passes through or is blocked by

name: Raging Direswine
description: A variety of Direswine extremely easy to anger, they dominate areas near water sources with great swagger. If one is enraged, it will indiscriminately rampage about with a madness sufficient to lay anything in the vicinity low.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 2 Block
Gradually accelerates when charging, dealing damage based on Movement Speed to any target it passes through or is blocked by

name: Haribeast
description: A dangerous creature with a back covered in thorns. Every thorn has a developed and impressively elastic muscular connection; upon sensing danger, they can fire their thorns with an abrupt and startling power. Even so, some people still aspire to raise them as pets.

abilityList.text: Weak spot located on its front, damage dealt to the rear is decreased
Deals damage in a semicircle to the rear at every fixed portion of health lost

name: Rainer Haribeast
description: A variety of haribeast growing unusual thorns, which can be shot at speeds rivaling that of arrows. Minute barbs grow on the tips, leaving wounds that fail to heal long after the skin is broken. Once, someone announced they'd successfully tamed one of these creatures; afterwards, they were never seen again.

abilityList.text: Weak spot located on its front, damage dealt to the rear is decreased
Deals damage in a semicircle to the rear at every fixed portion of health lost

name: Cautelotaur
description: A predator crafty by nature, with sightings of this species rarely reported. After feeding on the Chitotex Clawbeast, it uses the leftover carapace as a defensive tool, blocking fatal attacks in fights.

abilityList.text: After feeding on a <Chitotex Clawbeast> or <Keratex Clawbeast>, keeps its shell to use as a defensive tool, significantly lowering all damage except to the rear

name: Kouaku Cautelotaur
description: A cunning and ruthless variety of Cautelotaur, it conceals itself in herds to launch surprise attacks, the prey it catches subjected to its capricious whims. Most hunters that attempt to hunt this creature return with nothing to show for it.

abilityList.text: After feeding on a <Chitotex Clawbeast> or <Keratex Clawbeast>, keeps its shell to use as a defensive tool, significantly lowering all damage except to the rear

name: Norport Civilian
description: Ordinary folk scattered throughout Norport Borough. Abandoned by Londinium and subjected to the Sarkaz's high-handed blockade, these orphans have become the ones most deeply affected by the haze of war.

abilityList.text: Friendly Unit
Once their identity is confirmed, restores your max DP after retreating to the Objective Point

name: Norport Spy
description: Military spies disguised as civilians in Norport Borough, lacking the communication channels to pass on their abundant intel. They were already helping their Dukes learn about their rivals before the borough broke off from Londinium, and have seamlessly transitioned to spying on the Sarkaz Army's movements after the Military Commission seized control.

abilityList.text: Friendly Unit
Once their identity is confirmed, restores your max DP after retreating to the Objective Point

name: Pathfinder Spy
description: A spy hired by a mysterious employer to monitor their rivals while disguised as civilians. Most are amateurs at gathering intelligence, and their impulsiveness and unorthodox practices often expose the secrets they think they're keeping safe.

abilityList.text: Spy
When their identity is revealed, the next attack's ATK is greatly increased

name: Pathfinder Spymaster
description: A spy hired by a mysterious employer to monitor their rivals while disguised as civilians. These seasoned operatives will occasionally employ less orthodox methods to get their more impatient rivals to let down their guard.

abilityList.text: Spy
When their identity is revealed, the next attack's ATK is greatly increased

name: Sentry Spy
description: A spy hired by a mysterious employer to monitor their rivals while disguised as civilians. They have obviously undergone professional intelligence training, and the complexity of the blockade taught them even more about carefully observing their environment.

abilityList.text: Spy
When their identity is revealed, becomes Invisible

name: Sentry Spymaster
description: A spy hired by a mysterious employer to monitor their rivals while disguised as civilians. They know the blockade inside-out, and prefer to first gather enough crucial information before proceeding to the next step of their plans.

abilityList.text: Spy
When their identity is revealed, becomes Invisible

name: Armed Spy
description: A spy hired by a mysterious employer to sabotage their rivals while disguised as civilians. They are more or less professional soldiers with training in gathering intelligence, and their reliable weaponry and ample combat experience make them even more of a threat.

abilityList.text: Spy

name: Armed Spymaster
description: A spy hired by a mysterious employer to sabotage their rivals while disguised as civilians. They use their sharp intuition to judge the appropriate time to join the fray, and are able to resolutely execute their well-prepared plans.

abilityList.text: Spy

name: Sarkaz Absurdist Operative
description: Operatives attached to the Military Commission, specializing in gathering intelligence and softening the enemy frontlines. The actual leaders of this unit are a mystery, and are surprisingly always the first to show up wherever the Military Commission is operating.

abilityList.text: Attacks reduce DP when carrying ammo. Max ammo: 3

name: Sarkaz Absurdist Operative Leader
description: Operatives attached to the Military Commission, primarily tasked with assassinating high-value targets. When on a mission, they often arrive before their subordinates to soften the enemy frontlines with incredible speed, while simultaneously planning their next action.

abilityList.text: Attacks reduce DP when carrying ammo. Max ammo: 3

name: Sarkaz Absurdist Splitcaster Apprentice
description: A product of the cooperation between the Damazti Cluster and the Military Commission. Under the guidance of the Damazti Cluster, these extraordinarily gifted Sarkaz have learned to split themselves in two with Arts. However, every split places a heavy burden on the caster's body, and each imperfect replica merely makes them an easier target on the battlefield.

abilityList.text: When HP is below half, creates a <Virtual Image> at their location

name: Sarkaz Absurdist Splitcaster
description: A product of the cooperation between the Damazti Cluster and the Military Commission, able to effortlessly split themselves in two with Arts. They can easily adapt their imperfect replicas to draw the enemy's attention and give themselves an advantage.

abilityList.text: When HP is below half, creates a <Virtual Image> at their location

name: Sarkaz Absurdist Tyrant
description: A product of the cooperation between the Damazti Cluster and the Military Commission. Under the guidance of the Damazti Cluster, these Sarkaz soldiers have learned to use transformation Arts to appear more intimidating. However, the body affects the mind, and their lack of rationality makes them even more brutal in battle.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by Operators with 3 or more Block
First attack deals Splash damage

name: Sarkaz Absurdist Tyrant Captain
description: A product of the cooperation between the Damazti Cluster and the Military Commission, able to change their appearance with Arts. They can skillfully manipulate their flesh without damaging their brains, and are used to employing their intimidating forms to gain an advantage in battle.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by Operators with 3 or more Block
First attack deals Splash damage

name: Rebellion Instigator
description: Disruptors that constantly bypass the blockade. They weaken the enemy's forces from within by eagerly sowing fear among the masses, who in their panic break down the borough defenses all on their own.

abilityList.text: When not blocked, all unrevealed Civilians or Spies cannot be blocked

name: Rebellion Agitator
description: Disruptors that constantly bypass the blockade. They weaken the enemy's forces from within by taking the initiative to whip the masses into a frenzy, who in turn break down the borough defenses all on their own.

abilityList.text: When not blocked, all unrevealed Civilians or Spies cannot be blocked

name: Withering Collector Disciple
description: An organic construct containing the Nachzehrer King's Originium Arts. It can extract all kinds of dead souls from the battlefield to create Seeds of Withering.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Periodically summons several <Seeds of Withering>

name: Decaying Collector Disciple

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Periodically summons several <Seeds of Decay>

name: 'Trilby Asher'
description: 'Forever honor one's commitments,' the proud motto of House Caster. While the Duke's military and political might are more than enough to back their word, the 'Trilby Ashers' are the real reason why the Duke of Caster's words hold any weight.

abilityList.text: After several attacks, moves towards the next checkpoint for the next attack

name: 'Shadowing Trilby Asher'
description: To the Duke of Caster, a 'Trilby Asher' is more of a consumable than a collectible. On the day a 'Trilby Asher' is honored with the job, another 'Shadowing Trilby Asher' is also born—only succeeding their predecessor when their mentor dies.

abilityList.text: After several attacks, moves towards the next checkpoint for the next attack

name: Deconstructed Distortion
description: The Damazti Cluster has spent their long life trying to study themselves. This intelligent and audacious long-lived has tried to surmount the limitations of the flesh and bestow life to inanimate objects, but 'immortality' remains a difficult premise to prove.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Attacks inflict Corrosion Damage; loses HP every second

name: Military Hound

name: Elite Military Hound
description: Carefully picked military hounds that chase their quarry to the bitter end.

name: Trimounts City Defender
description: Columbian soldiers stationed in Trimounts. They have close ties to all the tech companies and first dibs on cutting-edge equipment.

abilityList.text: Attacks temporarily inflict -1 Block to allied Operators
If Operator is on a Gravity Switch, reduces their Block to 0

name: Trimounts City Defender Captain
description: Columbian soldiers stationed in Trimounts. They have a good understanding of all the tech companies and will choose to fight with their favorite corporation's equipment.

abilityList.text: Attacks temporarily inflict -1 Block to allied Operators
If Operator is on a Gravity Switch, reduces their Block to 0

name: Arc Commando
description: Soldiers from the experimental unit born of the 'Horizon Arc Project,' able to fly at low altitudes with their jet propulsion equipment.

abilityList.text: If Movement Speed is higher than starting speed, gains Low-Altitude Hovering and takes off!

name: Arc Commando Captain
description: Soldiers from the experimental unit born of the 'Horizon Arc Project,' skilled at flying with their jet propulsion equipment. They enjoy the feeling of defying gravity.

abilityList.text: If Movement Speed is higher than starting speed, gains Low-Altitude Hovering and takes off!

name: Arc Frontliner
description: Deadly soldiers from an experimental unit outfitted with cutting-edge equipment. However, the instability of their gear is their weak spot.

abilityList.text: Loses HP proportional to distance moved when shifted

name: Arc Frontliner Leader
description: Deadly soldiers from an experimental unit outfitted with highly lethal cutting-edge equipment. A formidable foe even when their gear's weaknesses have been revealed.

abilityList.text: Loses HP proportional to distance moved when shifted

name: Arc Screenguard
description: Soldiers from an experimental unit with formidable defenses using the most advanced alloy technologies. However, the unresolved instability of the material makes them better suited for short, high-pressure skirmishes than drawn-out battles.

abilityList.text: Starting DEF and RES are high, but reduced whenever damage is taken

name: Arc Screenguard Captain
description: Soldiers from an experimental unit with formidable defenses using the most advanced alloy technologies. They don't even need their equipment to hold the frontline and prevent the enemy's advance.

abilityList.text: Starting DEF and RES are high, but reduced whenever damage is taken

name: 'Offender' Production Model
description: Unmanned attack vehicles primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski. Equipped with advanced power units, they assault the enemy with their solid defenses and high speed.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by Operators with 3 or more Block

name: 'Offender' Prototype
description: Unmanned attack vehicles primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski. Equipped with advanced power units, they fiercely assault the enemy with their solid defenses and high speed.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by Operators with 3 or more Block
When passing by an Operator, deals physical damage to them based on Movement Speed

name: 'Crossroads' Production Model
description: Unmanned defense vehicles primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski. They emit mid-length lasers in all four directions, providing excellent defense in narrow corridors, and significantly hindering the enemy even in open terrain.

abilityList.text: Attacks in 4 directions while moving, dealing Arts damage and deals increased damage to nearby targets
Continuously tries to push nearby <Planetary Debris>

name: 'Crossroads' Prototype
description: Unmanned defense vehicles primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski. They emit intense mid-length lasers in all four directions, providing first-class defense in narrow corridors, and dramatically hindering the enemy even in open terrain.

abilityList.text: Attacks in 4 directions while moving, dealing Arts damage and deals increased damage to nearby targets
Continuously tries to push nearby <Planetary Debris>

name: 'Traffic Tower' Production Model
description: A robot primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski, the crystallization of cutting-edge advances in every field. Volvort Kochinski wanted to use this design to win back the DOD's favor, but it was overshadowed by the Galleria Stellaria.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 4 Block
DEF and RES is reduced whenever damage is taken
