name: 'Traffic Tower' Prototype
description: A robot primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski, the crystallization of cutting-edge advances in every field. If they could lower the cost of production to make it feasible for mass-production, perhaps it could even change the nature of warfare.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 4 Block
DEF and RES is reduced whenever damage is taken
When destroyed, ejects a <'Traffic Officer Captain'> and self-destructs, dealing physical damage to nearby units

name: 'Traffic Officer'
description: Pilot of a 'Traffic Tower,' the cream of the crop from the military's strict selection process. Has impressive combat abilities even after leaving their robot.

abilityList.text: Starts temporarily invisible and accelerates
Attacks temporarily inflict -1 Block to allied Operators
If Operator is on a Gravity Switch, reduces their Block to 0

name: 'Traffic Officer Captain'
description: Pilot of a 'Traffic Tower,' the cream of the crop from the military's strict selection process. Has formidable combat abilities even after leaving their robot. They are even trained to detonate their vehicle in emergencies and continue the fight on foot.

abilityList.text: Starts temporarily invisible and accelerates
Attacks temporarily inflict -1 Block to allied Operators
If Operator is on a Gravity Switch, reduces their Block to 0

name: Gnawbeast
description: An Infected Creature that appears in dark places. It has a high reproductive capacity, and can be commonly found everywhere. The endless usage of its host's food stocks makes it an unwelcome houseguest.

abilityList.text: Inflicts Bleed on allied Operators after several attacks

name: Starving Gnawbeast
description: An Infected Creature that appears in dark places. It has a high reproductive capacity, and is commonly found everywhere. It's currently starving! Be careful, hungry creatures tend to be more violent!

abilityList.text: Inflicts Bleed on allied Operators after several attacks

name: Vesperwing
description: An Infected Creature that appears in dark places, often found in deep caves and abandoned buildings. It is easily startled, and will not hesitate to attack intruders who enter its territory.

abilityList.text: Aerial unit, prioritizes attacking Holy Statue
Deals Arts damage
Inflicts Bleed on allied Operators after several attacks

name: Startled Vesperwing
description: A startled Vesperwing will attack intruders who enter its territory at any cost. Their claws and fangs are sharp, and they are both ferocious and impatient. But in their eyes, they're simply protecting their homeland.

abilityList.text: Aerial unit, prioritizes attacking Holy Statue
Deals Arts damage
Inflicts Bleed on allied Operators after several attacks

name: Wasteland Robber
description: A member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands using stolen weapons. They are not soldiers, and lack professional training, so stealing goods is more important to them than anything else.

Prioritizes attacking Holy Statue

name: Elite Wasteland Robber
description: An elite member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands using stolen weapons. Now leading a small group of subordinates, they have kept their plundering habits and are even greedier than their henchmen.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Prioritizes attacking Holy Statue
Steals 1 DP from allied Operators after several attacks

name: Wasteland Skulker
description: A member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands, sneakily operating in the shadows. They habitually speak in half-truths, and many of them used to moonlight as pickpockets before they drifted into the wastes.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Invisible
When on the field, natural DP regeneration rate is reduced

name: Elite Wasteland Skulker
description: An elite member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands, sneakily operating in the shadows. Some claim to have complicated pasts, but the truth of it is irrelevant: their skillsets are now used only for survival.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Invisible
When on the field, natural DP regeneration rate is reduced

name: Wasteland Plunderer
description: A member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands, equipped with the best gear the bandits can get their hands on. When life became unsustainable, some gave in to their desperation, becoming ferocious outlaws roaming the wastes.

name: Elite Wasteland Plunderer
description: An elite member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands, equipped with the best gear the bandits can get their hands on. The most vicious plunderers are completely indifferent to the suffering of others, having long forgotten that they were once just the most desperate of civilians.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
After several attacks, steals 3 DP and recovers a certain amount of HP

name: Bounty Hunter Crossbowman

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Prioritizes attacking Holy Statue
After several attacks, the next attack deals splash damage to a cross area surrounding the target and steals DP equivalent to the number of targets hit

name: Bounty Hunter Crossbowman Captain
description: A bounty hunter adept at attacking from long-range. A little skilled, with some notoriety. New bounties don't show up every day, so why not earn some extra money in their free time?

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Prioritizes attacking Holy Statue
After several attacks, the next attack deals splash damage to a cross area surrounding the target and steals DP equivalent to the number of targets hit

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield

Panic level continuously increases in battle

name: Hot Spring 'Mischievous Rascal'
description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice on the street, and wants to play with whoever it bumps into. Even though you can't make out its expression from its obscured face, you can sense it in its revelry.

abilityList.text: Leaves Carmine Steam at its location when defeated

name: Hot Spring 'Jolly Rascal'
description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice on the street, and wants to play with whoever it bumps into. Even though you can't make out its expression from its obscured face, you can tell it's relishing in its delight—listen! It's laughing!

abilityList.text: Leaves Carmine Steam at its location when defeated

name: Fashion Street 'Hearty Heavy'
description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from the sports field. It'll be really happy if you throw its 'treasure' back at it. Thankfully, it only throws frisbees, and not discuses.

abilityList.text: Leaves Carmine Steam at its location when defeated

name: Fashion Street 'Robust Heavy'
description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from the sports field. It'll be really happy if you throw its 'treasure' back at it. Wait, no! It seem to be holding discuses this time!

abilityList.text: Leaves Carmine Steam at its location when defeated

abilityList.text: Invisible
Can stack with a Hot Spring 'Mischievous Rascal' and leaves Carmine Steam on tiles it travels over after combining

name: Hot Spring 'Wandering Slider'

abilityList.text: Invisible
Can stack with a Hot Spring 'Jolly Rascal' and leaves Carmine Steam on tiles it travels over after combining

name: Fashion Street 'Ordinary Aviator'
description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from the aviation shop. It can fly, but it's not very good at it. Sometimes it can float up real high, but don't mistake it for a pink cloud!

abilityList.text: Low-Altitude Hovering
Can stack with a Fashion Street 'Hearty Heavy' and is capable of long-range attacks after combining

name: Fashion Street 'Hyperactive Aviator'
description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from the aviation shop. It can fly, but it's not very good at it. However, it's learned to float around in a group, filling the sky with soft clouds and interrupting the people's leisurely sunbathing.

abilityList.text: Low-Altitude Hovering
Can stack with a Fashion Street 'Robust Heavy' and is capable of long-range attacks after combining

name: Urban 'Whirlwind Walker'

name: Urban 'Tornado Trendsetter'

abilityList.text: Explodes on first attack, dealing AoE Arts damage and spawning Carmine Steam
Summons a Hot Spring 'Jolly Rascal' and Fashion Street 'Robust Heavy' upon dying

abilityList.text: Throws a Hot Spring 'Mischievous Rascal' on first attack

name: 'Big Man'

abilityList.text: Throws a Hot Spring 'Jolly Rascal' on first attack

name: Fashion Street 'Stellar Caster'
description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from a mysterious divination shop that will make anyone who notices it 'see stars'! It's very clever, and knows that the next most important thing after a wand is the magic hat on its head!

abilityList.text: Attacks 3 units simultaneously when in contact with Carmine Steam

name: Fashion Street 'Supernova Caster'
description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from a mysterious divination shop that will make people who notice it 'see stars'! It has become even stronger due to the latest limited-edition magic hat on its head.

abilityList.text: Attacks 3 units simultaneously when in contact with Carmine Steam

name: 'Fluffy Buddy'

When in contact with Carmine Steam, its explosion produces more Carmine Steam on surrounding tiles and dealing Arts damage to nearby allied units
When in contact with Pure White Steam, its explosion produces more Pure White Steam on surrounding tiles and healing surrounding allied units

abilityList.text: When defeated, deals heavy Arts damage in an area and causes all enemies on the field to gain 1 Energy.

description: A formation-breaker of the Sarkaz Royal Court that has received the blessing of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. Said to have violated the taboos of the Court, however the Sanguinarch did not punish them for their transgressions. Instead, they now inflict upon others the pain that should have befallen them.

abilityList.text: After several attacks, Stuns friendly units in an area.
Will be reborn as a <Gift of the Sanguinarch> after falling in battle for the first time

name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Scourger
description: An elite formation-breaker of the Sarkaz Royal Court that has received the blessing of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. Said to have disobeyed the Sanguinarch's will, however the Sanguinarch did not punish them for their transgressions. In return, these warriors convert their regret into endless slaughter and wash away their guilt with blood.

abilityList.text: After several attacks, Stuns friendly units in an area.
Will be reborn as a <Gift of Magnanimity> after falling in battle for the first time

name: Sarkaz Boneguard
description: A guard responsible for protecting the Feranmut's skeleton. As some of the most loyal adherents of the Military Commission, they will carry out their duties at any cost, even if they must shed their own blood.

abilityList.text: More likely to be attacked by friendly units.
Upon receiving damage, reduces the ASPD of the attacker.
Prevents <Anti-Witchcraft Repositionable Bombs> from moving when nearby.
Leaves behind 2 <Blood Amber> when defeated.

name: Sarkaz Boneguard Captain
description: A guard captain responsible for protecting the Feranmut's skeleton. As some of the most fervent adherents of the Military Commission, they will realize the Commission's will at any cost, even if they must shed their own blood.

abilityList.text: More likely to be attacked by friendly units.
Upon receiving damage, reduces the ASPD of the attacker.
Prevents <Anti-Witchcraft Repositionable Bombs> from moving when nearby.
Leaves behind 2 <Blood Amber> when defeated.

name: Sarkaz Boneguard Flayer
description: A professional armsmaster responsible for protecting the Feranmut's skeleton, carefully selected by the Military Commission. They use witchcraft to connect themselves with the Feranmut's nerves, allowing the entire skeleton to become their weapon.

abilityList.text: Recovers a portion of HP and gains increased ATK when either enemy or friendly units are defeated within range (can stack).
Leaves behind 2 <Blood Amber> when defeated.

name: Sarkaz Boneguard Torturer
description: An elite armsmaster responsible for protecting the Feranmut's skeleton, carefully selected by the most senior members of the Military Commission. The degree of their fusion with the Feranmut's nerves defies common understanding, with their ancient witchcraft drilled deep into their bodies.

abilityList.text: Recovers a portion of HP and gains increased ATK when either enemy or friendly units are defeated within range (can stack).
Leaves behind 2 <Blood Amber> when defeated.

name: Sarkaz Boneguard Fluxcaster
description: A Sarkaz Caster responsible for guarding the Feranmut's skeleton, their nature warped due to perpetually drifting through spacetime along with it. In times of emergency, they will call upon the Feranmut's power to disappear from the enemy's sight before reappearing at a more opportune time.

abilityList.text: If defeated within range of a Bloodcalling Altar, slips into a turbulence in spacetime and cannot be attacked during this period.
Will revive on the field when affected by an altar's pulse.

name: Sarkaz Boneguard Fluxcaster Captain
description: A Sarkaz Caster responsible for guarding the Feranmut's skeleton, their nature warped due to perpetually drifting through spacetime along with it, to the point that their very existence has become tenuous. In times of emergency, they will call upon the Feranmut's power to hide within the turbulent folds of spacetime before reappearing at a more opportune time to deliver a fatal blow.

abilityList.text: If defeated within range of a Bloodcalling Altar, slips into a turbulence in spacetime and cannot be attacked during this period.
Will revive on the field when affected by an altar's pulse.

name: Sarkaz Bloodwalker
description: A special entity within the Crimson Court, ensuring that no touch of the Crimson's dominion over blood goes to waste. They collect the essence condensed from the blood spilled on the battlefield and wait for it to be given form again through the ancient rituals of the vampires.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked.
Collects up to 5 pieces of dropped <Blood Amber>. When defeated, drops all collected <Blood Amber>.

name: Sarkaz Bloodnexus
description: A very special entity within the Crimson Court, ensuring that each strand of blood weaves the decrees issued by the Regent of the Royal Court. They collect the essence condensed from the blood spilled on the battlefield and wait for it to be returned to the cycle of slaughter through the ancient rituals of the vampires.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked.
Collects up to 5 pieces of dropped <Blood Amber>. When defeated, drops all collected <Blood Amber>.

name: Blood Amber
description: The blood that flows from warriors under the gaze of the Sanguinarch of Vampires will be turned into beautiful crystals waiting to be used once more, waiting to savor the taste of despair once more.

abilityList.text: When affected by the pulse of a Bloodcalling Altar, will be reborn as a Bloodborn Spawn at the altar.

name: Commander Ulšulah
description: Ulšulah, Lifebone's commander and the youngest major in the Kazdel Military Commission, fights not for any specific person or organization, but rather for the possibility that Kazdel can one day become a true country.

abilityList.text: [Marrowchill Aura] Significantly reduces the ASPD of surrounding allied units and gives a Bloodcalling Altar the ability to produce Blood Amber.
When defeated, returns to a Bloodcalling Altar and revives after a period of time.

name: Anti-Witchcraft Repositionable Bomb
description: A bomb whose explosion can suppress the effects of Sarkaz witchcraft, with a prototype delivery platform originating from Victoria. After being modified by a certain demolition expert, it has become a trump card in our desperate battles.

abilityList.text: Neutral unit; will be prioritized by both enemy and friendly units.
Movement Speed is slowed when attacked by an enemy unit, but increased when attacked by a friendly unit.
Explodes upon reaching a Bloodcalling Altar, dealing a large amount of True damage to surrounding enemies and destroying the Altar.

name: Remnant Orchestra Flautist
description: Flautist who wants to join their king's orchestra. This nobody has never seen the spectacle, and is all the more fanatical for it.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack has increased ATK

name: Witch King's Orchestra Flautist
description: Flautist who once played in their king's orchestra. This nobody has unfortunately seen the spectacle, and is all the more fanatical for it.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack has increased ATK

name: Remnant Orchestra Trumpeter
description: Trumpeter who wants to sound their king's triumph. His music is sharp and bright, and he believes himself to be the herald of victory.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack deals splash damage in a cross
Attacks deal Arts damage when passionate variation is active

name: Witch King's Orchestra Trumpeter
description: Trumpeter who once sounded their king's triumph. His music is sharper and brighter, and he has heralded many victories.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack deals splash damage in a cross
Attacks deal Arts damage when passionate variation is active

name: Remnant Orchestra Hornist
description: Hornist who wants to display his skills under their king. He has never had a chance to show off his talents, and waits for an opportunity to awe the world.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack hits an additional target
Attacks deal Arts damage when passionate variation is active

name: Witch King's Orchestra Hornist
description: Hornist who once displayed his skills under their king. He never truly had a chance to show off his talents, and waits for more opportunities to awe the world.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack hits an additional target
Attacks deal Arts damage when passionate variation is active

name: Remnant Orchestra Chorister
description: Chorister who wants to sing their king's praise. He tries to write his ode, but every word he pens is as malevolent as any curse.

abilityList.text: After 1 attack, the next attack restores HP based on ATK
Instead restores the HP of this unit and all enemies within attack range when passionate variation is active

name: Witch King's Orchestra Chorister
description: Chorister who once sang their king's praise. He has written many odes, but every word he pens is more malevolent than any curse.

abilityList.text: After 1 attack, the next attack restores HP based on ATK
Instead restores the HP of this unit and all enemies within attack range when passionate variation is active

name: Remnant Orchestra Wind Player
description: Wind player who wants to become the concertmaster of their king's orchestra. He worked hard to climb the ladder, but the orchestra is long gone, for which he is very resentful.

abilityList.text: ATK continuously increases when unblocked. ATK is reset after the next attack.
When melancholic variation is active, ATK is greatly increased, and attacks Stun the target

name: Witch King's Orchestra Wind Player
description: Wind player who was once the concertmaster of their king's orchestra. He was once atop the ladder, but the orchestra is long gone, for which he is beyond resentful.

abilityList.text: ATK continuously increases when unblocked. ATK is reset after the next attack.
When melancholic variation is active, ATK is greatly increased, and attacks Stun the target

name: Remnant Orchestra Drummer
description: Drummer who wants to set the beat for their king's music. Every beat he drums is filled with pain, for he punishes himself to achieve steady rhythm.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack deals splash damage to all targets in attack range
Attack range increases when passionate variation is active

name: Witch King's Orchestra Drummer
description: Drummer who once set the beat for their king's music. Every beat he drums is filled with suffering, for he torments himself to achieve impeccable rhythm.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack deals splash damage to all targets in attack range
Attack range increases when passionate variation is active

name: Remnant Orchestra Cellist
description: Cellist who wants to be their king's trusted henchman. He lives to earn their king's favor, for which he is willing to play obsequious tunes.

abilityList.text: More likely to be attacked by your units

When melancholic variation is active, ATK is greatly increased, and gains a Shield that protects against a certain number of attacks; each time damage is prevented, reflects as Physical damage based on own ATK

name: Witch King's Orchestra Cellist
description: Cellist who was once their king's trusted henchman. He lives to keep their king's favor, for which he is willing to play loathed tunes.

abilityList.text: More likely to be attacked by your units

When melancholic variation is active, ATK is greatly increased, and gains a Shield that protects against a certain number of attacks; each time damage is prevented, reflects as Physical damage based on own ATK

name: Remnant Orchestra Tuner
description: Musician who wants to tune for their king. He seeks the harmony of origin, so that all sounds may be consonant.

abilityList.text: Continuously casts at the nearest Tuning Node you control within attack range to disable it
When the corresponding variation is in effect, attacks temporarily increase damage taken by your units

name: Witch King's Orchestra Tuner
description: Musician who once tuned for their king. He has touched the harmony of origin, and in his hands all sounds may be consonant.

abilityList.text: Continuously casts at the nearest Tuning Node you control within attack range to disable it
When the corresponding variation is in effect, attacks temporarily increase damage taken by your units

name: Remnant Orchestra Conductor
description: Conductor who wants to be the instrument of their king's will. Being a conductor is already a rare honor, but he still seeks to climb that great spire, for which he will go to any length.

abilityList.text: Continuously casts at the nearest Tuning Node you control within attack range to disable it
When the corresponding variation is in effect, increases the max HP of all enemies within attack range

name: Witch King's Orchestra Conductor
description: Conductor who was once the instrument of their king's will. Having been second only to one, and having gazed upon that elusive spire, he will go to any length to see it again.

abilityList.text: Continuously casts at the nearest Tuning Node you control within attack range to disable it
When the corresponding variation is in effect, greatly increases the max HP of all enemies within attack range

name: Delegation Recruit
description: Soldier recruited into the delegation, employing the standard orthodox tactics. They are enjoying the peaceful lull.

name: Delegation Veteran
description: Soldier whose fate is entwined with the delegation, employing hardened and ruthless tactics. They are on guard against potential escalation.

name: Delegation Assault Recruit
description: New recruits on a special mission, firing warning shots with non-lethal weapons to avoid unnecessary loss of life. Having never seen war with their own eyes, they carry out their mission with expectations of peace.

abilityList.text: Attacks in <Frigid> areas deal Arts damage; attacks in Emergency Heater range deal Physical damage.

name: Delegation Assault Veteran
description: Veteran on a special mission, firing warning shots with non-lethal weapons to avoid unnecessary loss of life. Having seen death with their own eyes, they respond to orders with the instinctive reactions of war.

abilityList.text: Attacks in <Frigid> areas deal Arts damage; attacks in Emergency Heater range deal Physical damage.

name: Clockwork Patroller
description: Patrol machine developed for the local environment. Moves faster if it is wound up a few times before battle. Low firepower.

abilityList.text: Movement speed is reduced in Emergency Heater range.

name: Clockwork Warrior
description: Patrol machine developed for the local environment. Moves faster if it is wound up a few times before battle. High firepower.

abilityList.text: Movement speed is reduced in Emergency Heater range.

name: Frozen Mountain Burdenbeast
description: Mountain burdenbeast buried by a sudden avalanche. Its thick layer of fat will help it survive the worst of it until rescue arrives.

abilityList.text: Remains on standby in <Frigid> areas for a while without attacking.
Immediately revived if its plate is in Emergency Heater range

name: Slumbering Mountain Burdenbeast
description: Mountain burdenbeast buried by familiar snowfall. It will rest well in its habitual hibernation until it senses the spring breeze.

abilityList.text: Remains on standby in <Frigid> areas for a while without attacking.
Immediately revived if its plate is in Emergency Heater range

name: 'Jet Canister'
description: This weapon was developed for close-range assault in response to the painful experience of trench warfare, but how many would be willing to carry a such a heavy and fragile can on their backs?

abilityList.text: On death, deals Arts damage to all nearby units, inflicting Cold and disabling Emergency Heaters.

name: 'Boom Canister'
description: After many broken and exploded cans, people came to the realization that this weapon needed someone with a death wish, making trench warfare even more painful.

abilityList.text: On death, deals Arts damage to all nearby units, inflicting Cold and disabling Emergency Heaters.

name: Delegation Caster
description: Elite Arts attackers of the delegation, casting with perfect coordination, but still asked to take it easy.

abilityList.text: Attacks in <Frigid> areas deal splash damage in a cross; trait is inactive in Emergency Heater range.

name: Delegation Caster Commander
description: Ferocious Arts attackers of the delegation, casting with resonant harmony, but still ordered to take it easy.

abilityList.text: Attacks in <Frigid> areas deal splash damage in a cross; trait is inactive in Emergency Heater range.

name: Delegation Shieldbearer
description: Determined defenders of the delegation, their shields one with the frozen crystals, forming a wall on the snow that few can penetrate.

abilityList.text: DEF and RES gradually increase in <Frigid> areas, and gradually decrease in Emergency Heater range.

name: Delegation Shieldbearer Captain
description: Outstanding defenders of the delegation, their form one with heaven and earth, forming an unbreakable wall in the snow.

abilityList.text: DEF and RES gradually increase in <Frigid> areas, and gradually decrease in Emergency Heater range.

name: 'Catapult'
description: Expert grenadiers of the delegation, able to throw shells as heavy as a hundred kilos. The rest of the delegation knows better than to challenge them to a snowball fight.

abilityList.text: Throws a massive snowball, dealing splash damage in a cross
Can only use melee attacks once snowball is thrown

name: 'Mortar'
description: Elite grenadiers of the delegation, able to throw shells with the same power as city artillery. No one in the delegation is foolish enough to challenge them, so they roam the snow with their carefully crafted balls, waiting for a challenger foolish enough to fall into their trap.

abilityList.text: Throws a massive snowball, dealing splash damage in a cross
Can only use melee attacks once snowball is thrown

name: Delegation Centurion
description: Centurions are normally tasked with assaulting a fortified position. In the delegation, their main task is to defeat the defenders of the heaters.

abilityList.text: Invisible
Prioritizes targets to the right of a Emergency Heater

name: Delegation Centurion Champion
description: If defeating heater defenders has become the focus of the delegation's training, then it is no surprise that a champion would eventually emerge.

abilityList.text: Invisible
Prioritizes targets to the right of a Emergency Heater

name: Duck Lord
description: A famous Columbian investor, entrepreneur, and master of 'Duck Power.' Out of the public eye, enjoys kicking back with others...

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked.
Gains significantly increased Movement Speed after being attacked

name: Gopnik
description: The Ursus security guard hired by Duck Lord. Powerful, but not very smart. Mainly responsible for carrying luggage for Duck Lord.

name: Crying Thief
description: A Perro who left his family to seek out a new life... but all that people know is that he is always weeping.

abilityList.text: Invisible
Attacks Stun the target

name: Derisive Audience
description: A diehard fan of the Crimson Troupe, they enjoy the performances night and day. They have become as incomprehensible as the troupe itself.

abilityList.text: Attacks inflict additional Nervous Impairment

name: Scarlet Singer
description: A performer of the Crimson Troupe, they unleash their singing voices when sufficiently stimulated, inciting their followers to attack in a frenzy.

abilityList.text: Attacks inflict additional Nervous Impairment
After receiving a certain number of hits, greatly increases all enemies' ASPD for a short period

name: Theater Golem
description: A gigantic golem maintained by the Crimson Troupe's prop department, they are normally used to move bulky items. They are massive and difficult to block.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 4 Block
Attacks deal Splash damage to allied units in a small area around self

name: 'Small Surprise'
description: A special gift prepared by the Crimson Troupe for the audience. Every audience member who receives a gift will become particularly 'ecstatic'.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Upon death, deals Arts damage to all surrounding units and inflicts Nervous Impairment

name: Ominous Apparition
description: A patch of shadow. It has never once left, nor has it ever truly existed.

abilityList.text: Has a chance to dodge Physical and Arts attacks when not blocked
Can use a skill to deal Physical damage in the surrounding area
Attacks and skills ignore a certain amount of armor and inflict additional Nervous Impairment

name: Bone Sea Drifter
description: Sea Terrors travel in large swarms, seeking carcasses to feast on and becoming food for other Sea Terrors themselves.

abilityList.text: Attacks inflict additional Corrosion Damage.

name: Ocean Stonecutter
description: Sea Terror with a hard shell, protecting the swarm from enemies.

abilityList.text: When your units enter its attack range for the first time, temporarily stops moving and gains increased DEF.

name: Retching Broodmother
description: Sea Terror mothers that throw fake offspring at oncoming threats, allowing the true offspring to flee.

abilityList.text: Can only attack ground targets
Summons 1 <Baleful Broodling> near the target when dealing damage

name: Baleful Broodling
description: An extension of the broodmother's body, identical to newly-born offspring.

abilityList.text: Unable to move
Gradually loses HP over time
Attacks inflict additional Corrosion Damage.

name: Skimming Sea Drifter
description: Some Sea Terrors have begun to adapt to the sky, able to glide above the waves for extended periods. Perhaps this branch will eventually evolve to make their home in the heavens.

abilityList.text: Low-Altitude Hovering
Attacks inflict additional Corrosion Damage.

name: Pathshaper Fractal
description: Fractals left behind by the Seaborn Pathshaper. Illusions must eventually vanish. The path is not clear. Search on, search on.

abilityList.text: Dies after some time
Every 3rd attack summons a <Pathshaper Fractal>

name: Ishar'mla's Tears
description: Manifestation of Ishar'mla's explorative and combative nature.

abilityList.text: Appears around your units
Periodically deals True damage. If there are no targets within attack range, charges up <Ishar'mla, Heart of Corruption>
Disappears when <Ishar'mla, Heart of Corruption> transforms

name: Izumik's Offspring
description: One of Izumik's evolutionary branches, bringing genetic data collected across Terra back to the mother.

abilityList.text: Becomes a random enemy when blocked.

name: Chest Seaborn
description: Sea Terror disguised as a treasure chest, often used by Bishops of the Deep to protect hideouts.

name: Tainted Carcass
description: A Sami warrior irreversibly corrupted by demons. He once went to the snow fields with a clear purpose, but is now completely bereft.

abilityList.text: Movement Speed significantly increases for a short time after taking damage

name: Distorted Caster
description: A Sami shaman possessed by demons. Everything they understood about nature has been reconstructed into pure nothingness.

abilityList.text: Movement Speed significantly increases after not attacking for a period of time, resets on attack

name: Collapsed Construct
description: A drone corrupted by demonic power, now acting like a real lifeform.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.

name: Shattered Champion
description: Once an honorable warrior of the Treescar tribe, now a part of the demons' vanguard, together with their fallen chief.

name: Testaceous Vinecreeps
description: A seed falls into a box abandoned in the wild, and soon becomes a hunter preying on curiosity.

name: Retrofitted Gastruck
description: A pesticide spraying vehicle that used to belong to a large nomadic city. It has been retrofitted by Closure to spray tear gas instead, but she didn't have time to install an IFF system.

abilityList.text: When unblocked, all allied units lose HP constantly

name: Supercharged Gastruck
description: A pesticide spraying vehicle that used to belong to a large nomadic city. It has been retrofitted by Closure to spray tear gas instead, but she didn't have time to install an IFF system. This model has an expanded gas tank and is far more dangerous.

abilityList.text: When unblocked, all allied units lose HP constantly

name: Cheap Second-hand Drone
description: Cheap goods sold for scrap from the Kazimierz arenas. Feel free to waste it however you like.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
When destroyed, grants a deployable unit
Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter

name: Remodeled Second-hand Drone
description: Cheap goods sold for scrap from the Kazimierz arenas. Closure has performed some slight modifications on this batch, but it won't change the fact these are cheap as hell.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
When destroyed, grants a deployable unit
Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter

name: Mobile Power Source
description: An experimental prototype developed during the early years of a certain Columbian tech company. The objective was to provide power on the battlefield, however due to the lack of a positioning device, it will often leave by itself if unattended to.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked.
When destroyed, recovers the SP of nearby Operators
Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter

name: 'Pompeii'
description: A massive infected beast. These aberrations were born in a special high-temperature environment. Nobody wants to approach these creatures due to their grotesque appearance and the extreme heat they give off. The existence of these giant creatures has been known since ancient times, but to see one warped by infection is terrifyingly unforgettable...

abilityList.text: Can attack up to 4 targets at once and ignites targets it attacks, dealing Burn damage over time
Self-immolates when blocked, dealing heavy damage
Gains significantly increased ASPD when HP drops to half

name: Skullshatterer
description: One of Reunion's squad leaders who serves in the Assault Squad. Though armed with an Originium launcher and explosives, reports show that he possesses high mobility and poses a significant threat even in melee combat.He has been seen several times around Lungmen, and intel suggests that he is carrying out some special operation in the region.

abilityList.text: Launches grenades when not being blocked, significantly reducing the DEF of the target and surrounding allies for a short period of time
Gains significantly increased ATK when HP is under 50%

name: Crownslayer
description: One of Reunion's squad leaders who handles infiltration and assassination operations, specializing in melee combat and breaking through defensive lines. Her stealth and superb infiltration abilities have foiled countless attempts to capture her.

abilityList.text: When blocked, can quickly move behind the unit

name: Talulah
description: The leader and spokesperson of Reunion. So far, she has been confirmed to have masterminded multiple riots, as well as the destruction of Chernobog.

abilityList.text: [Stellar Corona] Deals Arts damage to all allied units within range
[Burning Breath] Causes an allied unit within attack range to take True damage that gradually increases (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be Resisted)
Deals True damage when blocked
When HP drops below half, gains greatly increased DEF and RES and uses skills more often

name: W
description: A Sarkaz Mercenary and one of Reunion's squad leaders, she carries around a weapon that resembles a Laterano Gun. However, she almost exclusively attacks using explosives and throwing weapons. One of her common strategies is to attack the enemy's flank using large amounts of active Originium explosives. However, her erratic movements make her almost impossible to predict...

abilityList.text: Can use explosives to deal heavy Physical damage to allied units
Uses more explosives when HP is under 50%

name: FrostNova
description: A Caster who is one of Reunion's squad leaders. She is one of the few Casters capable of suppressing enemies in a head-on engagement. Among the squads she leads, the special 'Yeti Squadron' assists her in some special operations. As her name implies, she has a cold personality.

abilityList.text: Frequently attacks allied units within range with Ice Nova, dealing heavy Arts damage and reducing the ASPD of affected units for a few seconds
Can Freeze the ground with Arts, rendering them unable to be deployed upon
Revives after dying for the first time, gaining increased ATK

name: Mephisto
description: A Medic who is one of Reunion's squad leaders, often working in tandem with Faust. He heals the wounded while commanding his troops to attack, and can improve their life recovery rate. He boasts a high resistance to Arts. Currently, it has been confirmed that he is the one controlling the Hosts.

abilityList.text: Doubles the HP regeneration of all enemies on the field
Regular attacks heal 3 enemies simultaneously

name: Faust
description: A Sniper who is one of Reunion's squad leaders, often working in tandem with Mephisto. He uses extremely long-range attacks to inflict devastating physical damage. He is known to occasionally use special attacks such as summoning turret-like ballistae or launching highly destructive bolts.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked and is initially Invulnerable for a period of time
Can attack with a special bolt dealing double damage
Periodically summons a hidden turret on the battlefield

name: 'Rat King'
description: Lin, Lin Gray, the Rat King of the slum. He bears many titles, just like the shifting of the city's shadows underneath his feet. Don't touch the red lines. If you ever have a moment of indecisiveness, whatever it is that you were concerned about will become nothing more than a whisper in the winds above the dunes.

abilityList.text: [Singing Sands] Targets a unit with the highest Max HP, dealing heavy physical damage to the target and nearby allied units within a cross area
[Sand Tomb] Targets a unit with the lowest Max HP, continuously inflicting Arts damage to the target and nearby allies, also reducing their ATK
Appears with a Barrier that can absorb a large amount of Arts damage, gains significantly increased DEF while Barrier is active
Deals more damage when HP drops below half

name: FrostNova, 'Winter's Scar'
description: Leader of the Yeti Squadron, she has released the remainder of what little life force she has left in preparation for the final battle. The biting cold of the land has already been released; are we truly prepared to make an enemy out of it?

abilityList.text: Normal attacks and Ice Nova deal Arts damage and applies Cold to targets
Ice Nova deals double damage to Frozen targets
Initially Invulnerable for a period of time during the second form, attacks and skills become stronger

name: Patriot
description: His armor is in disrepair and damaged in many places. The blade of his once sharp halberd is now eroded with rust. However, the indomitable Patriot never capitulates, never backs down, and never shows mercy. He has long struggled with fate, and now resolves to slit the throat of fate.

abilityList.text: Greatly increases the ATK and DEF of enemy units
Marching Stance
Gains greatly increased ATK, DEF, and RES. Becomes more likely to be targeted by your units, and normal attacks strike 4 times
Enters a revival state when HP drops to 0, continuously dealing True damage to units around him. After a period of time, enters Ruination stance
Ruination Stance
Can perform long-ranged attacks
Deals Physical damage to the farthest high ground unit
Continuously deals True damage to allied units within range
Immune to Stun, Frozen, and Levitate

name: Mudrock
description: Age unknown, gender unknown, history unknown. This ex-Reunion member now leads an organization of Infected and wanders the wilderness between the cities of Leithanien. What thoughts run through Mudrock's mind as being forced to once again step upon the battlefield?

abilityList.text: Every attack permanently increases ATK, stacking up to 6 times
Has a shield that absorbs Arts damage; while the shield persists, this unit has greatly increased Max HP and ASPD
Barrier periodically refreshes
Can use a skill to automatically seize control of the nearest non-enemy controlled 'Gramophone'

name: 'The Big Ugly Thing'
description: Zumama's magnum opus, a massive mechanical monster piloted by the High Priest. It can strike both in melee range and from a distance, capable of easily destroying Giant Mushrooms and Stumps. Normal engineers cannot even fathom how a machine slapped together haphazardly like this can even move, but move it indeed does.

abilityList.text: First Form
Ranged attacks deal Splash damage, Melee attacks deal more damage
Periodically destroys Giant Mushrooms and Stumps, rendering them unable to be deployed upon
When HP drops to 0, it will explode, Stunning units in a large area and ejecting its pilot, the High Priest
High Priest Form
Will not attack, cannot be blocked, and takes True damage every second

name: Corrupted Knight
description: A Sarkaz knight with a broken horn who radiates terror and shows clear signs of excessive drug use. Uses a warhammer in battle. Crushes enemies with terrifying bloodlust. When the Withered Knight falls, takes up the quest and becomes dramatically stronger. Every step he takes spreads corruption.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal Physical damage to the target and adjacent allied units
Does charged attacks, dealing heavy Physical damage to the targets and any adjacent units
Gains greatly increased ATK, ASPD, and Movement Speed when <Withered Knight> dies

name: Withered Knight
description: A Sarkaz knight with a broken horn who radiates terror and shows clear signs of excessive drug use. Uses a cursed bow in battle. Can shoot multiple targets at once and plant seeds of withering arts. When the Corrupted Knight falls, takes up the quest and becomes dramatically stronger. Knights that are hostile to him will shift to Wither.

abilityList.text: Attacks 2 targets simultaneously
Fires explosive arrows at three targets which explode after a short delay, dealing high Arts damage to the target and surrounding four tiles
Gains greatly increased ATK, ASPD, and Movement Speed when <Corrupted Knight> dies

Relying on his cunning and life experiences over the years, he became a boxing fixer in the wilderness, and even had the beautiful dream of snatching some land in a nomadic city to build a underground boxing arena, but he had no idea that the key to success or failure was never in his hands to begin with.

Some scholars believe that its ability to fly is new evidence of unintelligent organisms actively manipulating complex Originium Arts, while others believe it is nothing more than a naturally occurring phenomenon under hyper-specific conditions. This question has yet to be resolved, as no biologist has been desperate enough to approach it.

If an Operator is defeated or retreats while affected by Haunting Flames, that Operator will be sealed, and cannot be redeployed until the Haunting Flames are destroyed.

[Payback] When HP drops to 0, all surrounding Operators will immediately be engulfed by Haunting Flames. Periodically releases <Condensed Heat> towards a friendly unit (if no eligible targets, this will be released towards the Objective Points instead).

[Condensed Heat] These flying flames released by Sverdsmeltr have low DEF and inflict continuous Arts and Burn damage to surrounding Operators. When they reach their target or the target leaves the field, they will self-destruct and deal Arts damage in a large area. Drains a Life Point upon reaching the Objective Point.
Second Form
Sverdsmeltr summons his Reforged Retinue and flies into the air. During this period, he will periodically release <Condensed Heat> towards a friendly unit nearby.

When all Reforged Retinues are defeated or when Sverdsmeltr falls below 50% HP, Sverdsmeltr will absorb all remaining Reforged Retinues and restore HP. Afterward, he will land on the ground, where he deals long-ranged AoE Arts attacks and gains the following abilities:

[Extinction] Incapacitates one Operator on the field, causing them to be unable to act and releasing <Condensed Heat> at them. This <Condensed Heat> has higher HP and damage, and destroying it will allow the targeted Operator to resume acting.

[Sunwielder's Sanctuary] After using [Extinction], gains a shield that absorbs a fixed amount of Arts damage. While this shield holds, this unit has greatly increased DEF and deals Arts and Burn damage to surrounding friendly units.
